articles.description: On the eve of the first ODI, the Babar Azam-led side was hosted by Pakistan's interim chief selector Shahid Afridi for a dinner at his residence
articles.content: The two-match Test series between Pakistan and New Zealand ended in a 0-0 draw, after the bad light abruptly ended the game on Day 5. In the chase of 319, the hosts had a forgettable start as they lo… [+2239 chars]
